channel.title: Room of ores
channel.description:
DO NOT SAY ROOM OF WHORES
this is all legit on the server i used pistons ect was very time consuming
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/21cbfv8.jpg[/img]

item.title: Room of ores
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:17, topic:409229”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=510505.msg3705673#msg3705673 date=1313017407]

So you found a diamond vein beside a Redstone and Lapis Lazuli one, then you put the others in? correct?

no its just under the surface you can ask herobrine i showed him it

Yeah it’s not too far from the surface. Actually, It’s under a lake…

EVERYONE CHECK UDNER EVERY LAkE IN MINECRAFT…

9999999 years later…

x: around 0
z: -9k

lol.

thats the actual coords lol
[/quote]
prepare to get thoughs blocks stolen.[/quote]

yea someones gonna walk 9k blocks for res protected diamonds

Read full topic

item.title: Room of ores
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:7, topic:409229”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=510505.msg3704602#msg3704602 date=1312946540]
So you found a diamond vein beside a Redstone and Lapis Lazuli one, then you put the others in? correct?
[/quote]
Coal, Redstone, Diamond and Lapis all give an item when mined, not the block. Also, those 4 to be exactly like that are too improbable, so he did have to use pistons to move, etc.[/quote]
Forgot about Coal >.< What I meant was, he might have found the diamond, redstone and lapis together. I totally forgot about pistons though.

Read full topic

item.title: Room of ores
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

ytuio9:

So you found a diamond vein beside a Redstone and Lapis Lazuli one, then you put the others in? correct?

Coal, Redstone, Diamond and Lapis all give an item when mined, not the block. Also, those 4 to be exactly like that are too improbable, so he did have to use pistons to move, etc.

Read full topic
